SongLyrics.JpnStr: 突然[とつぜん]のキスや 熱[あつ]いまなざしで
SongLyrics.EngStr: A sudden kiss and a passionate gaze

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 恋[こい]のプログラムを 狂[くる]わせないでね
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't let the love program go crazy

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 出逢[であ]いと別[わか]れ 上手[じょうず]に打[う]ち込[こ]んで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Skillfully inputting encounters and farewells

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 時間[じかん]がくれば終[お]わる Don't hurry!
SongLyrics.EngStr: It will end when the time comes, don't hurry!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]に傷[きず]ついた あの日[ひ]からずっと
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ever since the day I was hurt by love

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 昼[ひる]と夜[よる]が逆[ぎゃく]の 暮[く]らしを続[つづ]けて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I continued a life where day and night were reversed

SongLyrics.JpnStr: はやりのDiscoで 踊[おど]り明[あ]かすうちに
SongLyrics.EngStr: While dancing the night away at trendy discos

SongLyrics.JpnStr: おぼえた魔術[まじゅつ]なのよ I'm sorry!
SongLyrics.EngStr: I learned the magic, I'm sorry!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]のことを決[けっ]して 本気[ほんき]で愛[あい]さないで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Never love me seriously

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 恋[こい]なんてただのゲーム 楽[たの]しめばそれでいいの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Love is just a game, as long as you enjoy it, it's fine

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 閉[と]ざした心[こころ]を飾[かざ]る 派手[はで]なドレスも靴[くつ]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: The flashy dress and shoes decorate my closed heart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 孤独[こどく]な友[とも]だち
SongLyrics.EngStr: Lonely friends

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]を誘[さそ]う人[ひと]は 皮肉[ひにく]なものねいつも
SongLyrics.EngStr: The people who invite me are always ironic

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 彼[かれ]に似[に]てるわなぜか 思[おも]い出[で]と重[かさ]なり合[あ]う
SongLyrics.EngStr: They resemble him, somehow overlapping with my memories

SongLyrics.JpnStr: グラスを落[お]として急[きゅう]に 涙[なみだ]ぐんでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Suddenly dropping my glass, tears welling up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: わけは尋[たず]ねないでね
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't ask me the reason

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜更[よふ]けの高速[こうそく]で 眠[ねむ]りにつくころ
SongLyrics.EngStr: As I fall asleep on the late-night highway

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ハロゲンライトだけ 妖[あや]しく輝[かがや]く
SongLyrics.EngStr: Only the halogen lights glow mysteriously

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 氷[こおり]の様[よう]に冷[つめ]たい女[おんな]だと
SongLyrics.EngStr: They say I'm as cold as ice

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ささやく声[こえ]がしても Don't worry!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I hear whispers, 'Don't worry!'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: I'm just playing games
I know that's plastic love
Dance to the plastic beat
Another morning comes
